name: Dutch Apple Pie
steps: 1/2 c. butter at room temperature. Preheat oven to 375. Eggs on crust bake for 5 min. down to 350.
Combine apples, lemon juice, 2/3 c. sugar, 1/3 c. brown sugar. 1/4 c. flour, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg. Mix well with spoon into crust.
Mix remaining ingredients for topping. Bake on baking sheet until streusel is golden and filling is bubbling. About 35 minutes. Cool for 4 hours.
Omit lemon juice if apples are tart.
